title: Rion
description: GINII drove everyone out of my life.I vow to live in solitude, locking all the doors shut ever since I was too young.I didn't even realize I was going to hide behind them, and most apparently from reality.Now, he banged all the doors down and walked into my life.His reputation pisses and scares the hell out of me.All he says is he owns me and asks me for things I can’t give him.If I don’t comply, he threatens to ruin me, not with death.But to survive and live along with serious burn injuries.  RION Talking is just taboo to me.And Gini is about to spend her life as my wife, whether she likes it or not.It's all sealed.If she fights me, I'd chain her. I won't even think twice about it.She isn't going anywhere.That's all you should know about me.I hate talking. I am a type who'd fucking love to show it.Because I am beyond borderline douche.A double-douche.
author: K.R. Ruth
